description: Rand Paul's campaign is running an advertisement in New Hampshire and Iowa through the weekend accusing Donald Trump of being a Democrat. For many years, Trump espoused views that are more moderate than the positions he's taken recently. The spot includes footage from 2004 of Trump saying, "I've been around for a long time, and it just seems that the […]
title: Rand Paul is attacking Donald Trump for making a 100% true statement about the economy
